text: etala mate je vyakti tamari pase a jnana avi gaya chatam pana tamari sathe a babate jhaghado kare to tame kahi do ke avo! Ame ane tame pota potana santanone tatha ame ane tame pota-potani stri'one tatha ame ane tame pota-potana jivone khasa karine bolavi la'i'e, pachi apane namratathi darakhasta kari'e ane jutha'o para allahani la'anata (phitakara) kari'e
